div.head: Description of changes for 2012.09
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft based on a copy from the St. Victor diplomatic transcription. A transcription of the Sorbonne manuscript still awaits completion. After a comparision of manuscript witnesses corrections and additions will be made. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still await constructions.
